website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-use trimmer that's best for those looking for an innovative electric nail clipper for babies.
pros: Users love how fast and easy this model is to use and feel it's worth the cost because of its good quality
Stands out for its unique file-like trimming design that's appreciated for safety
We also like that the electric design is quiet and has two speeds
cons: Product didn't last long for some users
babies may not like the noise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! So easy to use!!!! Way better then clipping his nails!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah DeLaurier

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product that fulfills its promise. I am able to quickly and safely file down my baby's nails without risking cutting her. The files are of good quality and last through multiple uses. I made the mistake of ordering a cheap version of this type of file and the files barely lasted one use before they came apart. The device itself appeared to be the exact same as this one on the outside. I wish I would've had this when my baby was a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Annette & John

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 1 month- Update: They replaced for free
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 1 month of light use. No longer rotates. The light comes on my no rotation?? Past my window of returned because I ordered this before our baby was born and after using it on him for a month it no longer works. Update: After contacting the company direct regarding the trimmer no longer working, they have offered to replace the trimmer free of charge. This is helpful and shows they stand behind their products and want to make issues right.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase. I had been worried that the pad might be abrasive on the skin, but it's not at all. I've been able to keep my baby's nails trim without having to worrying about cutting her. TIP: you have to yank the file attachment to get it off and the battery cover is a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBee73

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it. I was having such a hard time trimming and cutting my little one's (LO) nails and this made it so much easier for me and my LO. It's quick and easy. Reccomend this product
customer_reviews.author: Diana Leyva

customer_reviews.title: A Godsend!
customer_reviews.text: I was terrified of trimming my newborn's nails, nails which I must say, grew unbelievably fast. Just a couple of days after a death-defying trim, they'd be long again and she'd be scratching herself. I tried emery boards as well, equally horrible. I don't know of a single baby that sits still long enough to accomplish either task. And forget doing it while she sleeps, I refuse to even take a chance she'll wake up, This handy device works amazingly well and fast! And it's so soft it doesn't hurt their skin at all if they jerk while you're doing it. Just wish Amazon sold the replacement pads.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I was having a lot of trouble ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I was having a lot of trouble trimming my 10 months old baby's nail and this made it easy breezy! Even has a light on he too what make sure it perfect! I wish I had bought this when she was born!
customer_reviews.author: NCrowell.

customer_reviews.title: Almost caught fire 15 minutes after putting batteries in. Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The product melted about 15 minutes after putting two brand new AA batteries in the unit. Luckily I was home before the product was able to start a fire. Total piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: ALL THE PARENTS SHOULD HAVE ONE ON THIS
customer_reviews.text: After cutting the skin of my little baby by mistake and seeing him crying bad I said I will never use the regular nail clipper again. I was looking for something safe and here the solution. The results are unbelievable and I get his nails done in less than 5 min. It actually works great for me and my hubby. Happy mommy happy baby!!! Thank you little martins for making my life easier!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristbel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Worked once
customer_reviews.text: After one used it won't work anymore even with changing batteries. Replacement came but the product box was open on both sides and one of the product piece seems either used or damaged. Ended up buying a different brand than this one. I will say, that time I used it on my 2 month old baby was great. He didn't seem to mind it and got through his nails in a flash.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Dingle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this baby nail trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this baby nail trimmer! We have a 4 month old and he is starting to squirm a lot so this makes trimming his fingers and toes a breeze! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for babies!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this nail trimmer. We were trying to file our baby's nails with a little tiny baby file and it took forever and was nearly impossible with a squirming baby! We were never filing enough and she was constantly scratching her face. When I tried this I was so excited because it's so quick, easy, and it works. It's very gentle and doesn't hurt her fingers at all. The only things I don't like is that it doesn't work great on adult nails and the case sucks because if you tip it at all, all the attachments fly out of their spots. Overall very happy though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my son (5months) fights like crazy when I would try to clip his nails. This works great is is fast and easy to use once you get used to it. The light doesn’t really work because the attachments block the light but it doesn’t effect the actual filing at all so that’s really my only con. I also used the extra attachments on myself and they made filing so much faster!
customer_reviews.author: jacob112233

customer_reviews.title: Trims nails with comfort
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well. I was worried the trimmer would hurt my baby’s hand but it does not. My boys actually seem to enjoy it. I was trying to use a standard fingernail file but it wouldn’t shave the nail enough and it took to long. I bought this and it trimmed my boy’s nails in seconds. The only problem I have is shaping the corners. This trimmer will file the center down quickly leaving the corners slightly sharp. I think I just need to master how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalee Welch

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The hospital pediatrician told us not to use clippers, but to file baby's nails. My husband was terrified to use this, and I was skeptical after reading mixed reviews, but there was no other option so we bought it. There is a lovely youtube video of a dad showing how to use this thing on his baby and you can tell how safe and painless it is. My husband is a baby manicure pro now. Use the gentle pink one on newborn nails and our baby doesn't wake up. We have not had issues like other reviewers of it not working after one use or whatever. Perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: D&N

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I have a 10 month old & have been using one of these since she was about 3 months. I love that I dont have to worry about hurting her. The one I had previously was ok but kept stopping when I would push on her nail even slightly, & the motor seemed just super weak. So I bought this one which was 15$ more than my previous one but you REALLY get what you pay for! This one is GREAT. The motor & light work awesome & it doesnt stop on me every 2 seconds! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Baby isn't even here yet and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE that this comes with adult filing ends as well! My baby isn't expected to be here for another month (GAH) but I took this out of the package to test and get used to it. It's SO EASY to use and I am very excited to use this as others have, when their baby is asleep at night. My sister's 1 year old gave her such a hard time with regular clippers, but he likes the feeling of this on his fingers! Makes a mom's life SO EASY! Thank you! Update: baby Nash is here and I was able to use this on him when he was just in a light nap. He didn’t even flinch! LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Super useful
customer_reviews.text: The product works as expected. It takes some practice so try it on yourself before your baby. I only wish there was an additional tool to help smooth any sharp edges on baby's nail after using the trimmer. I also find the lowest setting to still be quite fast for using on a baby. Overall, I was too nervous to use clippers on my baby's soft tiny nails. This makes it so much easier to do her nails. She lets me do them while she nurses and it doesn't seem to bother her at all.
customer_reviews.author: joanne

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle on skin but works for everyones nails ages 2weeks - 5 years. Definitely worth it! Makes life so much easier! Nothing else worked as well on newborns nails. Update: I wish I got this for baby #1 not #3! My 5 year old and 2 year old actually fight over who gets their nails filed first now! My 2 year old will giggle while I do her nails. I used to need to bribe my kids to let me do their nails. Now everyone is more than happy to have them done, nobody gets accidental "owies," it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Daxis

customer_reviews.title: Wow, perfect for newborns
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous about trimming our brand new little baby's nails, it's not like cutting adult nails, they're week and their nail beds extend a ways into the white of the nail so you can hurt your little one on accident pretty easily. Just trimmed hers today, she was awake the whole time, 5 days old and she didn't even seems to care that we were filing them down. Totally worth the stress relief in my opinion. Will be very useful for months and maybe years to come with our little one.
customer_reviews.author: C Fox

customer_reviews.title: Liked it, until it stopped working...
customer_reviews.text: We LOVED this product until it stopped working. While using it, it slipped and fell (maybe a foot) and completely stopped working. The light works, but the spin stopped. It’s unfortunate that an item for children would stop working so quickly - accidents are going to happen, so I would hope an item like this would be strong enough to last a very small drop. We will be purchasing another brand, as we don’t want to risk another $30 with the same mistake. :(
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for non-hansy babies and adults
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive to use this ‘grinder’ on our new born but it certainly is a game changer and helps us keep her nails trimmed and short and less like weapons. This is a great little set which helps groom nails of all ages (mine included). As the little one has grown up, she wants to ‘explore’ the machine with her mouth. Unlike the scissors I used to use, this feels like a safer device to let her explore (ofcourse supervised). Get this, use this- it doesn’t abraid the skin and gets the job done nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Anisha Agarwala

customer_reviews.title: Does the job! So glad I have it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! I was terrified of clipping my daughter's nails after hearing horror stories from my friends about cutting their babies fingers with convention clippers. Though all of the attachments seem over kill and the light does a poor job at all of shining past the attachment, the attachments that I use work well and the light is really intreaguing to my baby so that buys me a little time of her being still enough for long enough to get the job done. Just make sure the room is well lit and you'll be ok.
customer_reviews.author: GratefulART

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trimmer, poor seller response and false promises
customer_reviews.text: Trimmer itself works well so 5 stars on that. The issue is more on the sellers lack of response as well as promising pad replacement if you leave a review. Well, no response or confirmation of that happening and still have heard nothing several days later, oh well. Again it is a great trimmer, baby sleeps through the process and it is very quiet, just plan on getting amazon involved if there is an actual problem with the trimmer not working to get it resolved because the seller will ignore.
customer_reviews.author: Marlaina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Still getting the hang of it, but love using it so much more than standard clippers. So much easier and can do with baby asleep or awake. The nails do grow back a bit sharper than trimming with clippers. Feels like I have to use this more than when I used clippers, but now that baby doesn’t sleep just anywhere any more it’s harder to clip their nails when sleeping. Customer service is definitely lacking. In the box you receive a card saying I’d you sign up for their website you’ll receive a free refill pack and emails from their company. No such luck.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: Must have with kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this sooner!!!! This is a MUST for anyone with a baby or baby on or kids!! You need to put this on your registry!! Sooooooooo easy and trims great, better than nail file. Only down side the light siant very good on the device and you really need to be in a well lit area or have someone hold a flashlight while using device with baby nails and see what you are doing.. *Update The card insert that was in box, to get free refills NEVER got them. For that I deduct a star
customer_reviews.author: Clover17

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution; causes breakage and hangnails
customer_reviews.text: This seems at first to work really well and my baby actually laughed and enjoyed her little “manicure,” however I started noticing she was getting hangnails that would catch on fabrics etc and potentially hurt her. Also it caused splitting and breaking of her nails which I believe is what led to those hangnails. I had to purchase a pair of tiny safety scissors just to take care of the breakage caused by the file. I love the concept of this file and it’s fairly easy to use and quick and doesn’t cut her skin BUT I believe it could damage her nails more than I’m comfortable with, so I try to minimize how often I use this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Newborns
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. My baby came out with sharp nails and had scratched her face before we left the delivery room. The newborn head is super soft (it doesn’t hurt when you put it against your own skin at all) and lets baby sleep completely through nail trims. No blood at all and her skin doesn’t seem damaged at all by it even when it hits her skin a little. We’ve only been using the newborn attachment at low speed which has worked perfectly. This was a great purchase and I would 100% buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about you but I was terrified at the thought of clipping my daughter’s nails. We had a nail file that came with the personal hygiene kit we got at my shower but that was ineffective. I ordered this after my daughter scratched her face pretty badly (she hates mittens) during the night. It’s easy to use, portable, and doesn’t hurt her. I will be recommending this to EVERY new mom and getting it as a baby shower gift! So inexpensive for the headaches it saves you.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for clipping babies nails
customer_reviews.text: I like that the end rotates in both directions however use it on yourself first, if you use the wrong direction on the wrong side of the end it could chip their little nails. I’ve noticed since I’ve transitioned to only using this file I’ve had to do it more often then just cutting but my baby is really interested (for like 3 fingers) in the little machine. The light is not all that bright and doesn’t point in the direction you need. I also was transitioning from the nail clipper with LED lights at the end that you need a welding shield to see of how bright they are so it may work exactly how it’s suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jertberg

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I ever tried to cut my daughters nails with regular nail clippers. What a life saver this has been. We had been cutting our now 6 month old daughters nails the old fashioned way up until a month ago when she got a little cut. We bought this hoping to never have any problems cutting her nails again. This is such an amazing product! The only down side is the discs provided wear out pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and totally awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is a total gem!! I have yet to clip my baby's nails, I only file them, but it takes me quite a while and the baby nail files are tricky to hold. But this tool makes it a breeze! And I'm done so quickly! I can do it when he is asleep and he doesn't even flinch. Excellent product!! My baby is currently 3 months old and the pink setting works beautifully for his nails.
customer_reviews.author: kcrawley

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time/ kids both fell asleep
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I'll be keeping this product because of the amount of time it takes. For my infant it is totally worth it. She was awake and didn't fuss or seem to notice. The noise is very quiet. For my 2 year old it is much easier to just cut his nails so I'm not sure the amount of money is worth the limited time use I'd say more for like 0-6m. But they did both fall asleep as I filed their nails. 😳
customer_reviews.author: Matt Randall

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for the first time and my baby loved it. She actually smiled and laughed the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: I just used this product for the first time and my baby loved it. She actually smiled and laughed the whole time I used it. I think the vibration sensation was new to her but she enjoyed it and I was able to cut her nails down shorter than I ever have before. And it was so quick and easy to use! No chance of causing any injury. I no longer have to wait for that perfect moment when baby is sleeping and I have enough light to clip her nails. I can do it anywhere and anytime!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: You need this nail file.
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute essential! I have never nicked or taking blood from my baby's finger because of this awesome automatic filer. You can put it basically directly to baby skin and it will not hurt. It makes doing her nails a very easy chore while she's eating. I can get her nails knocked out in less than 5 minutes. I like to this so much I bought it for my friend who just had their baby. This will be my go-to baby shower gift from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: KaiNai02

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. After one horrifying fingertip massacre
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. After one horrifying fingertip massacre, I vowed to never clip my son's nails again. Instead, I would use a traditional file but this would take so long and he'd be so squirmy throughout the process. After getting this motorized nail file, our nail grooming time is cut down significantly. The motor is very gentle and very, very efficient. I thought it might be too hard but I tried it on my finger and it's extremely gentle. Amazing product that manicures baby's nails without the danger of hurting them!
customer_reviews.author: justine g.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I bought it and the heads barely lasted more than 3 months with a couples uses. I reached out the company and they told me to purchase more heads which cost 1/3 of the actual item. So you have to keep buying and replacing. Look for another company that actually lasts!!!!
customer_reviews.author: YG

customer_reviews.title: This is a very useful tool with a baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful tool with a baby! And for myself! It used to take me forever to clip my 8 week old’s nails but this makes is super easy. ONLY catch is I make sure I use it when they are still kind of short as maintence, I think If you wait until nails are too long it would take awhile (just like for an adult, filing long nails to make them short would take longer!). I have to do it when my baby is sleeping anyways, he is never still enough for anything!
customer_reviews.author: Nazeena Sandhu

customer_reviews.title: Super SAFE, FAST, EASY
customer_reviews.text: I have use scissors, clippers and baby nail files. All are fine to use, but not only is this 1000x EASIER, FASTER and it's also SUPER SAFE. That's what I call baby proof! Fine, it's a lot more money, but if you can spare it and just want easy, safe, fast smooth nails so your baby can't hurt himself/herself - BOOM, done, just buy it and thank the Little Martin guys later.
customer_reviews.author: M.R

customer_reviews.title: Better than nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to use regular baby nail clippers on my preemie twins, this looked like a good alternative. It's super gentle and the twins don't mind having their nails filed by this electric file. I had tried the regular manual file but the girls would pull their hands away and protest, they were not on board with the regular baby nail files. This worked perfect and is at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Twinning_mom

customer_reviews.title: Better than a regular filer.. used on newborn
customer_reviews.text: This takes about the same effort as it would with a regular filer. But the results are better and gives better finish. Once you get the hang of it you can totally avoid scratching the skin underneath the baby's nail which was difficult with a regular filer. AA battery operated, easy to install and replace. Only used it a couple of times on 1 month old, so can't speak about how much the battery lasts and product durability at this point. Not the cheapest but we find it totally worth for smaller babies.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best invention for baby’s nails!
customer_reviews.text: We had a scare when my wife tried to clip our baby’s nails and she started screaming. Luckily there was no blood or skin gone but it scared the **** out of us we instantly ordered this lol. This thing makes shortening her nails SO much easier! I haven’t gotten them perfectly smooth yet but definitely shorter and less sharp. Very quiet tool & painless. Now she doesn’t mind sitting and getting her nails did lol
customer_reviews.author: Vinecia Tanai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on newborn, safe & easy
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my newborn every week now, including 1st day home. He doesn't pull away or even seem to notice. Not even when he wiggles and I miss and tap his skin. It is so light that it doesn't cut his skin or leave a mark. Highly, highly recommend. I have a pair of scissors that just scared me to even try. Definitely worth the cost. I use the white file on him. I tried on myself first and worked, too. I just have to remember to switch directions when I change hands to make it turn smoothly. (Up on level 1 for left hand, down on level 1 for right works best for me). Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Taren, Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Only nail trimmer I'll use on a baby
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use the standard nail clippers on our baby, but he moved around too much. Our friends recommended this nail trimmer to us and let us borrow theirs. We used the white tip to trim his nails (more like "buff" his nails). It's so gentle that even when he squirmed or wiggled, it was ok because it was gentle on his skin. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: SamReview

customer_reviews.title: Never using regular clippers again
customer_reviews.text: Life saver. Nicked babies skin with the normal Safety 1st baby clippers. After clipping them her nails were still sharp and it was so hard to file them using a regular nail file. I will never use clippers on her again. This file is great. She is 6 mo and I still use the pink file for her nails. We were able to finally stop using mittens and no longer have to worry about her scratching her head or face.
customer_reviews.author: Xc010

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product for anyone with a baby! This makes it so much easier to trim their nails because you’re not afraid to hurt them or cut their skin. The grinder is very soft and gentle so I’m not afraid to hurt her with it but it is able to file back her nails. If you push too hard and shuts off which is also a good feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: We used a nail clipper before this and had hurt our baby. One of our friends suggested this product and we cant thank her enough. This is super easy and trims nails very fast. Now our daughter enjoys whenever we trim her nails. Also, anyone can use this because the trimmers are so soft and doesn't hurt baby fingers. One of the must haves you need when it comes to babies safety.
customer_reviews.author: Sindhu

customer_reviews.title: Works great for newborn nails (that seem to grow just tooooo fast)
customer_reviews.text: I honestly dont know if I could have managed my newborns nails without this. One of the hardest things I need to do is take care of those suckers, every couple of days (man I wish my nails grew that fast). The build in light is really helpful. There is a bit of a learning curve with these. It's really easy to get the center of the nails with this trimmer, while leaving the edges sharp like little needles. But no matter how hard this is, I can imagine using a nail clipper until he is much older.
customer_reviews.author: Fawkeia Sorian

customer_reviews.title: A must have for baby dragons
customer_reviews.text: If you also have a baby dragon, get this baby file. I swear my daughter has retractable claws which she digs into me while we nurse. No matter how much I clip, chew or peel her nails off I would not get them short enough and walked around looking like I was mauled by a wolverine. Thanks for this nail file I have finally got them short enough. They come with multiple coarseness options and are gentle enough not to hurt your baby’s delicate fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren SaundersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to clippers
customer_reviews.text: This little file is a great solution for keeping baby nails short and getting rid of sharp edges. The clippers made me so nervous so a nail file seemed like a great idea and so far we are pretty happy with this one. The added adult discs are a nice bonus however the pink disc which we have only been using for 3 months is already starting to show quite a bit of wear so I'm not sure about the longevity of the discs.
customer_reviews.author: redpat2061

customer_reviews.title: Never using regular nail clippers again
customer_reviews.text: A friend suggested this trimmer after I recounted a particular traumatizing attempt to clip our newborn son's nails (involving lots of tears, and trying to fit adult-sized bandaids on a 4-week-old's finger). I will NEVER go back to the old clippers after using this trimmer- it's easy, fuss-free (for both baby and mom/dad), and results in smoother nails than the old-fashioned clippers. Now, if only my dogs would learn to be as chill as our son when it comes time to trim nails...
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Avoid cutting your baby, GET THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Very excited about this trimmer! A lot easier to use than an emery board and no risk of hurting baby. I’ve used it both when baby is awake and asleep and it’s never bothered him. The only thing you have to be sure to do is keep baby’s nails on the outer edge of the pad on am angle for best results. But I LOVE this!
customer_reviews.author: Larfox

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product until it just stopped working 9 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product until it just stopped working 9 months after I started using it on my baby. The warranty states that I would need to pay for the repair and the shipping there and back - not worth it. On another note, when I received this in the mail it was packaged in an envelope with no padding so the case arrived cracked and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Baby necessity. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: After trying every type of clippers, scissors, and manual nail files out there to keep my baby’s razor sharp claws in check, I tried this. THIS PRODUCT IS AMAZING. No fear of cutting or harming the baby, plus his nails stay smooth and no more scratches on his face. I’ve already ordered two more to give as shower gifts. This is a necessity for anyone with a baby. I might even try it on my dog’s nails (she hates getting them clipped)!
customer_reviews.author: KristenP

customer_reviews.title: 100% Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 months old and for 3 months I have struggled to keep her tiny baby talons at bay using a regular baby nail file. I did my best but could never get them filed down enough because she would wiggle and scream throughout the process. I just received this in the mail today and she now has neatly trimmed and smooth nails (fingers and toes) and it took me about 3 minutes in total. She also didn’t cry at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective nail filer, but takes a few tries to get the hang of it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my then 4 month old daughter, who constantly scratched her face and left marks. I was previously using the baby nail scissors since she was born, but noticed that they left her nails feeling sharp. A friend with an infant recommended this filer and told me her son never had scratches EVER. Honestly, it took a few tries to get comfortable with the nail filer (holding it at the right angle, getting over my concern of hurting the baby), but after 2 or 3 tries, it really does work so well! I file her nails at least once a week and she rarely has scratches on her face anymore! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: OMG i love this!
customer_reviews.text: My baby keeps scratching his face and I could never do a good job with a traditional nail clipper. This machine looked scary at first but once I started using it, I fell in love with it immediately. I highly recommend it for babies from birth. Don't let it intimidate you, it's much simpler than you think!
customer_reviews.author: Sena Zorlu

customer_reviews.title: Easy, effective nail filing
